title: Lily Allen reveals bipolar suffered post traumatic stress | Daily Mail Online
text: Lily Allen revealed she suffers from three mental health problems on Twitter Lily Allen yesterday revealed she has bipolar disorder, a potentially crippling mental health condition. Writing on Twitter , the singer also said she suffered post traumatic stress disorder after her son was stillborn. The revelations came during a heated Twitter debate about the treatment of pensioners. When told by another user that he felt she had mental health illness, she replied: ‘I DO have mental health issues. Bi-polar, postnatal depression, and PTSD, does that make my opinion void?’ She later explained to her 5.9 million followers that her PTSD occurred after her son was stillborn in 2010, six months into her pregnancy. She described the ordeal for the first time yesterday, in graphic detail, saying: ‘I lay in a hospital bed with my deceased son stuck between my legs halfway out of my body for ten hours.’ RELATED ARTICLES
